info.name: Gym API
info.description: Complete API collection for Gym Management System built with NestJS

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns JWT token and user information.
Authenticate user with email and password. Returns JWT token for subsequent requests.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration and login

request.description: Create a new gym member account. Requires ADMIN role.
Retrieve a paginated list of members with optional filters. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific member.
Update member profile information. Requires ADMIN or MEMBER role.
Soft delete a member account (sets isActive to false). Requires ADMIN role.
Retrieve all class bookings for a specific member.
Retrieve all workout plans assigned to a specific member.
Create a new trainer account. Requires ADMIN role.
Retrieve a paginated list of trainers with optional filters.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific trainer including their classes.
Update trainer profile information. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Soft delete a trainer account (sets isActive to false). Requires ADMIN role.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Premium Monthly",
  "description": "Full access to all gym facilities and classes",
  "price": 99.99,
  "durationDays": 30,
  "type": "PREMIUM",
  "features": ["Unlimited gym access", "All classes included", "Personal locker", "Free towel service"]
}

request.description: Create a new membership plan. Requires ADMIN role.
Retrieve a paginated list of all available membership plans with optional filters.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific membership plan.
Update membership plan details. Requires ADMIN role.
Assign a membership plan to a member. Requires ADMIN role.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific membership.
Upgrade a member's membership to a new plan. Requires ADMIN or MEMBER role.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Morning Yoga",
  "description": "Relaxing yoga session to start your day",
  "trainerId": "{{trainerId}}",
  "schedule": "2026-02-01T08:00:00Z",
  "duration": 60,
  "capacity": 20,
  "classType": "Yoga"
}

request.description: Create a new fitness class. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Retrieve a paginated list of classes with optional filters.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific class including bookings.
Update class details. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Soft delete a class (sets isActive to false). Requires ADMIN role.
Book a class for a member. Requires ADMIN or MEMBER role.
Cancel a class booking. Requires ADMIN or MEMBER role.
Record a member check-in for gym visit or class attendance.
Record a member check-in for a specific class.
Record a member check-out.
Retrieve a paginated list of attendance records with optional filters. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Generate an attendance report for a member within a date range.

item.name: Workout Plans

request.description: Create a new workout plan with exercises. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Retrieve a paginated list of all workout plans with optional filters. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Retrieve all workout plans assigned to a specific member.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific workout plan including exercises.
Update workout plan details. Version history is preserved. Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Soft delete a workout plan (sets isActive to false). Requires ADMIN or TRAINER role.
Retrieve all versions of a workout plan.
Retrieve a specific version of a workout plan.

item.description: Workout plan management endpoints with version history
